title: Rune Update Ideas?
body:
After i watched Gaming Curios's video, (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L32tXURFqXk) i though of a new way the rune system would work, so after some though i came up with the idea of after reaching high in-game stats you would gain a rune as shown below (examples):

Reaching 500 or over Ability Power = 1 AP Rune
Reaching 500 or over Attack Damage = 1 AD Rune
Reaching 2.0 or over Attack Speed = 1 AS Rune
Reaching 80% or over Critical Chance = 1 CC Rune
Reaching 300 or over Magic resist = 1 MR Rune
Reaching 300 or over Armour = 1 AR Rune

With a cap on gaining 3 runes per match. And then to gain stronger runes/Quintessences you would "forge" several of the same runes together making a stronger rune.

And 1 last thing..... What about all my IP? Are we going to be reimbursed?

If anyone have any thoughts or other ideas leave a comment below!

replies.body: I think in a competitive role based game like this you cant have direct incentives that effect how you play too much. having this motivation to get x stat may deviate you from what you would normally do and ruin the experience for others. eg "well im going full ap support with no support item now cuz i need this ap rune" etc. this is also likely the reason there are no acheivements for characters (as cool as it would be) eg get a pentakill on jinx and unlock x skin.
That is a true point but to counter that they could have it like 200AP, you get me? BTW the examples i had were not reasonable i was just giving random numbers.
won't happen bc it becomes incredibly easy for some champs and bullshit hard for others to do without pissing off all of their team mates.
